original_text: When the chief baker saw that Joseph had given a favorable interpretation, he said to Joseph, “I too had a dream: On my head were three baskets of bread.
korean_text: 떡 굽는 관원장이 그 해석이 좋은 것을 보고 요셉에게 이르되 나도 꿈에 보니 흰 떡 세 광주리가 내 머리에 있고

sentences.original_text: that Joseph had given a favorable interpretation
On my head were three baskets of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 내 머리에 떡 세 광주리가 있었습니다
